definition: Yikatong (Beijing public transport smart card)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Lily: I think you should report your loss of One-Card.
sentences.chinese: 我想你應該先去掛失一下你的一卡通。

sentences.english: I think you should report your loss of One-Card.
sentences.chinese: 我想你應該先去掛失一下你的一卡通。

sentences.english: The design and application of "one-card-pass" system in hospital;
sentences.chinese: 一卡通系統的設計和應用提高了校園信息化管理水平。

sentences.english: I've just processed a card in CMB.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛去招行開了一卡通回來。

sentences.english: "All-in-one ID" is the new field of library automation.
sentences.chinese: “一卡通”是圖書館自動化的新領域。

sentences.english: Centuryfair devotes itself to the R &D and production of smart card system equipments.
sentences.chinese: 世紀順實業着力於一卡通系統設備的研發生產。

sentences.english: Why did I always lose my One-Card?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我老是在丟一卡通呢？

sentences.english: Research and Application on Integration Technology of Heterogeneous Databases in Campus One-Card-Through System;
sentences.chinese: 一卡通系統的設計和應用提高了校園信息化管理水平。

sentences.english: A :Now the debugging of the system has not been finished, so the campus One-card can still not be used.
sentences.chinese: 現在系統還沒有調試好，還不能使用校園一卡通。

sentences.english: Campus services is started from one-campus-ID card.
sentences.chinese: 校園服務建設一般從一卡通入手。

sentences.english: Thee-card can be used on both the campus.
Excuse me, my transport card is broken, what can I do?
sentences.chinese: 請問，我的一卡通壞了，怎麼辦？

sentences.english: In chapter 3, it describes the basic situation of subsystems of campus E-card in detail.
sentences.chinese: 第三章詳細地介紹了校園一卡通各子系統的基本情況。

sentences.english: You can go to the transport card sales point to get a new one.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去一卡通銷售點去換個新的。

sentences.english: It has lay a good foundation for constructing the campus One-Card system.
sentences.chinese: 爲校園一卡通的建設打下了良好基礎。

sentences.english: The design and application of all-in-one card system raised the campus informatization management level.
sentences.chinese: 一卡通系統的設計和應用提高了校園信息化管理水平。

definition: to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
stored-value card/prepaid card (telephone, transport etc)
system for identifying users (on a rail network, the Internet etc)
student identity card
identity card/ID
to report the loss of something
medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement
library card
EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
cardholder
magnetic stripe
debit card
to recharge (money onto a card)
Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
